description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.
title: Narcos

episodes.title: Descenso
episodes.description: Chilean drug chemist Cockroach brings his product to Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA agent Steve Murphy joins the war on drugs in Bogota.

episodes.title: The Sword of Simón Bolivar
episodes.description: Communist radical group M-19 makes a move against the narcos, while Murphy gets an education in Colombian law enforcement from his new partner Peña.

episodes.title: The Men of Always
episodes.description: Murphy encounters the depths of government corruption when he and Peña try to derail Escobar's political ambitions by proving he's a narco.

episodes.title: The Palace in Flames
episodes.description: Despite a new extradition treaty, the U.S. puts more money into fighting communism, creating new challenges for Murphy and Peña in the hunt for Pablo.

episodes.title: There Will Be a Future
episodes.description: Pablo's extreme methods put the narcos on the brink of war with Carillo and the government. Peña tries to protect his witness.

episodes.title: Explosivos
episodes.description: Peña and Carillo close in on Gacha. Murphy tries to protect pro-extradition candidate Gaviria from a notorious assassin connected to Pablo.

episodes.title: You Will Cry Tears of Blood
episodes.description: Pablo goes into hiding as the political tide turns against him, but he finds a way to strike back. Murphy and Peña finally get the CIA to help them.

episodes.title: La Gran Mentira
episodes.description: A tragic mistake forces the government to change tactics in the fight against Pablo. But Pablo faces bigger threats from inside his empire.

episodes.title: La Catedral
episodes.description: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over after he makes a deal with the government, but Murphy and Peña - and the Cali Cartel - have other plans.

episodes.title: S1.E10 ∙ Despegue
episodes.description: Pablo's activities in prison provoke the government into taking extreme action. Murphy and Peña face a situation of their own.

episodes.title: Free at Last
episodes.description: In the aftermath of a massive military effort to take Pablo into custody, the family reunites while enemies worry. Steve and Connie fight about safety.

episodes.title: Cambalache
episodes.description: Tata gets impatient with life on the run. Pablo responds to President Gaviria's reward offer. Steve and Javier meet their new boss.

episodes.title: Our Man in Madrid
episodes.description: President Gaviria has a new job for an old colleague. The Search Bloc's new tactics shake up Pablo, but also unsettle Steve and Javier.

episodes.title: The Good, the Bad, and the Dead
episodes.description: The Cali cartel discusses moving in on Pablo's territory. Limón proposes a plan to Maritza. Tata gets a gun for protection.

episodes.title: The Enemies of My Enemy
episodes.description: The Search Bloc gets a new leader. Javier loses faith in the system. Pablo brings Tata's brother Carlos down from Miami to cheer her up.

episodes.title: Los Pepes
episodes.description: The newly-formed Los Pepes want to destroy Pablo and his empire. Tata's brother urges her to leave and seek safety with her children.

episodes.title: Deutschland 93
episodes.description: As the danger intensifies for the Escobars, Pablo sends his family to another country. Gaviria weighs the opportunity to use them as leverage.

episodes.title: Exit El Patrón
episodes.description: Colombia begins to turn on Escobar after his latest terrorist attack. Tata receives help from an unlikely ally. Quica gets increasingly anxious.

episodes.title: Nuestra Finca
episodes.description: Pablo is reunited with an estranged family member. Judy Moncada's life is put in danger. The DEA and CIA clash over how to handle Los Pepes.

episodes.title: Al Fin Cayó!
episodes.description: Javier deals with the repercussions from Judy's interview. Tata tries to convince Pablo to surrender for the sake of his children.

episodes.title: The Kingpin Strategy
episodes.description: The Gentlemen of Cali gather their associates together for a big surprise announcement about the future of their business.

episodes.title: The Cali KGB
episodes.description: A gas incident threatens to destroy the agreement between Cali and the government and requires Jorge's help. Peña has problems with his old contact in Los Pepes.

episodes.title: Follow the Money
episodes.description: The Rodríguez brothers are hiding during the negotiations. Pacho meets the Lord of the Heavens in Mexico. Peña's new DEA team visits Cali.

episodes.title: Checkmate
episodes.description: Peña hatches a plan to try to capture Cali leader Gilberto Rodriguez. Amado proposes a business idea to Pacho.

episodes.title: MRO
episodes.description: Paranoid about leaks, Miguel cracks down on his security. Pacho makes a decision about his new offer. Peña works on cultivating a witness.

episodes.title: Best Laid Plans
episodes.description: Jorge takes a dangerous risk. An accident in New York threatens to expose Chepe. Peña travels to Curacao to arrest a potential witness.

episodes.title: Sin Salida
episodes.description: Peña plans another secret operation to topple a member of the Cali cartel but may run out of time while looking for him.

episodes.title: Convivir
episodes.description: David seeks revenge on behalf of his father and puts Enrique in danger. Peña asks Don Berna for help on a rescue mission.

episodes.title: Todos Los Hombres del Presidente
episodes.description: David follows his suspicions. Peña is shocked to discover the depth of corruption in the Colombian government. Miguel is sought after once again.

episodes.title: Going Back to Cali
episodes.description: David and Peña are in a race against each other to find Pallomari. Peña makes a serious decision about the future of his career.
